title: Qamqor — Co-Founder, Mini-App for Financial Literacy
description: Built a super-app mini-platform helping retirees improve financial literacy through interactive tips and guidance.

title: YieldFlow — AI-Driven DeFi Yield Management Platform on Solana

title: NASA Exoplanet Detection AI — Research Project

title: FairTender — Suspicious Government Procurement Analysis

title: Chess.AI — AI-Powered Chess Learning Platform
